snippet: The final regulations have been released, and business groups are complaining that the only streamlining the I.R.S. appears to have achieved is for itself.
abstract: The final regulations have been released, and business groups are complaining that the only streamlining the I.R.S. appears to have achieved is for itself.

headline.main: The I.R.S.'s Final Mandate Reporting Rules? Still Complicated
